title: I need to delete my credit card info
body: I used my credit card to buy some Riot Points but my mother doesn't want me to use that card for making RP purchases, but since I already confirmed something it doesn't let me go back and delete it (at least I can't find the way to delete it) and I'm really nervous about having it up there is there any way to delete it from being perma-saved on my account?

replies.body:
To remove the credit card profile from your account, you can take the following steps:


- Next to the RP Balance you will see the link to the Store.
- Click on the "PURCHASE RP" button in the top right corner.
- Select the Credit Card purchase method.
- Select a increment of Riot Points.
- During step one of the purchase process, open the pull down window and select the card you would like to remove.
- Press the blue "Delete" button to remove the card.
